description: 1-minute demo: AI-powered lead qualification with BANT/MEDDIC analysis, scoring, and next-best-action recommendations
trigger_phrases: I have 45 new inbound leads from the conference. Help me qualify and prioritize them for follow-up.

persona.name: Amanda Chen
persona.title: SDR Team Lead
persona.context: 45 leads from trade show, need to qualify and route to AEs within 24 hours for follow-up

agents_utilized.description: Enriches lead data with firmographic and technographic information
Scores leads against ideal customer profile criteria
Analyzes leads against Budget, Authority, Need, Timeline criteria
Generates customized outreach sequences based on lead context
Assigns leads to appropriate AEs based on territory and expertise
Tracks response times and triggers escalations
Generates summary reports and conversion tracking

conversation_flow.user_message: I have 45 new inbound leads from the conference. Help me qualify and prioritize them for follow-up.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Analyzed 45 leads with ICP scoring and BANT criteria.

| Tier | Leads | Action |
|------|-------|--------|
| Hot (80+) | 8 | AE handoff |
| Warm (60-79) | 15 | SDR call |
| Nurture (<60) | 22 | Email sequence |

**Top 3 Hot Leads:**
- TechFlow Industries (94) - VP Eng, active eval
- Meridian Corp (91) - CTO, budget approved
- Apex Solutions (88) - Competitor displacement

Source: [ZoomInfo + 6sense]

Want BANT analysis on hot leads?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, show me the BANT breakdown for the top 5 hot leads
conversation_flow.agent_response:
BANT analysis for top 5 hot leads:

| Lead | Budget | Authority | Timeline | Score |
|------|--------|-----------|----------|-------|
| TechFlow | $200K | VP Eng | Q1 | 94 |
| Meridian | $150K | CTO | 60 days | 91 |
| Apex | $180K | Director | Q1 | 88 |

**Key Signals:**
- TechFlow: Demo booth visited twice
- Meridian: CTO asked technical questions
- Apex: Competitor contract ending

**Risks:** Summit budget TBD, DataCorp needs decision maker

Create personalized outreach?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, create personalized outreach sequences for each hot lead
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Personalized outreach created for all 8 hot leads:

**TechFlow:** "Connecting 12 data sources in weeks" - 15-min deep dive CTA

**Meridian:** "60-day migration playbook attached" - Stack discussion CTA

**Apex:** "40% of [Competitor] customers switched" - Comparison call CTA

**Sequence:** Email today → LinkedIn day 2 → Value content day 3 → Phone day 4

Assign leads to AEs?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, assign to AEs based on territory and expertise
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Leads assigned by territory and expertise:

| AE | Leads | Value | Specialty |
|----|-------|-------|----------|
| Mike Rodriguez | 3 | $470K | Enterprise |
| Sarah Kim | 2 | $330K | Healthcare |
| James Chen | 2 | $280K | Manufacturing |

All AEs under 80% capacity. Handoff packages include BANT summary, booth notes, and email drafts.

Set up SLA tracking?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, set up tracking and make sure we hit our follow-up SLAs
conversation_flow.agent_response:
SLA tracking activated:

| Tier | Response SLA | Escalation |
|------|-------------|------------|
| Hot | 4 hours | Manager alert |
| Warm | 24 hours | Team alert |
| Nurture | 48 hours | Auto-sequence |

**Automated:** Slack alerts at 2hr remaining, manager notification if missed, auto-stage updates on meeting booked.

**Targets:** 100% hot contact rate, 40% meeting conversion, $800K pipeline

Generate summary?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, summarize everything and give me the action plan
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Lead qualification complete!

| Result | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Leads analyzed | 45 |
| Hot leads | 8 ($800K) |
| Outreach created | All hot leads |
| AEs assigned | 4 reps |
| SLA tracking | Active |

**Total Pipeline:** $1.25M (Hot $800K + Warm $450K)

**Next:** 8 hot leads get AE outreach within 4 hours, 15 warm get SDR calls, 22 nurture enter email sequences.

Your conference leads are qualified and assigned with 4-hour SLA tracking.

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response

business_value.problem: 45 conference leads need qualification and routing within 24 hours, manual process takes days
business_value.solution: AI-powered BANT qualification with data enrichment, personalized outreach, and SLA tracking
business_value.roi: $1.25M qualified pipeline identified, 8 hot leads worth $800K+, 4-hour SLA enforcement
business_value.performance: 45 leads qualified in minutes vs hours, personalized outreach for all hot leads, automated tracking
